channel.title: [ dragonscape v001] pernix, torva, virtus. epic!
channel.description:
[b][size=18pt]DragonScape V001[/size][/b] [b][size=14pt]This server has alot to offer, when you join You receive a starter kit. Its a easy based server, leveling is fast. Staff is friendly. The staff is a topic you would love to enjoy talking about, seeing as there are over 3 moderators and a couple admins. The owner "Rawrgasm" Focuses on stabilizing the server for the users. This server is constantly updated with a minimum of 15 people. The server features alot! [/size][/b]
WEBCLIENT: http://rs-ps.org/play.php?server=dragonscapev001
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t9fSLhNVB6U[/youtube]
:D[b] FULLY WORKING JAD![/b] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s14.postimage.org/jn6zzllf5/Jad.jpg[/img][/url]
:D[b] EPIC RARE SHOP![/b] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s16.postimage.org/kbn74kdgl/RARES.jpg[/img][/url]
:D[b] PK SHOP USING COINS NOT PKP![/b] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s15.postimage.org/sfas61ewb/coolshop.jpg[/img][/url]
:D[b] TORVA , PENIX , VITUS SHOP'S + KORASI![/b] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s15.postimage.org/tch7ewqej/RARES.jpg[/img][/url]
